text.autoconfig.numericalhud.title: Numerical HUD
text.autoconfig.numericalhud.option.anim:
Controls how the HUD values animate when they change.
Decimal: numbers count up/down with decimals.
Fade: the number snaps instantly and the text color fades back to white.
Popup: a delta value (+2, -3) floats next to the module for 1 second.
text.autoconfig.numericalhud.option.show: When disabled, the Armor module is hidden entirely while the player has no armor equipped.
